DOC.brief_title: A Comparison Controlled Ventilation With V60 Non-Invasive Ventilator v . Traditional Mask Ventilation
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine whether experienced anesthesia provider adequately and/or easily mask ventilate anesthetize patient commercial non-invasive ventilator device . The ventilator subject study commonly use ICU investigator aim evaluate usefulness OR . Investigators believe ventilator ventilate consistent breath rate , adequate tidal volume minimal airway pressure . The provider subjective score ease difficulty ventilation device also record .
DOC.criteria: adult 1874 year age , ASA status IIII , present elective surgery require general anesthesia University Utah able provide inform consent oropharyngeal facial pathology , risk aspiration ( define need rapid sequence intubation , uncontrolled gastroesophageal reflux disease ) , know and/or document difficulty place endotracheal tube past , limited neck extension flexion , restrictive lung disease , personal familial history malignant hyperthermia know predict severe respiratory disease compromise . Female subject must negative urine pregnancy screen .
